entry.dcterms:description: opinions about pension funds and the pension insurance; pension supplement insurance, age exemption; retired people's living conditions and situation, the amount of pension; opinion about the new pension system; taking risks; party preferences, popularity index of politicians; opinion about law abiding, the freedom of speech; opinion about the tasks and roles of the government in managing the economy, using taxes, social services; the working of democracy, having a say in politics
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
political institutions, public administration
mass political behavior, attitudes
social behaviour and attitudes
law, crime and legal systems
person
survey data
time-series

The settlement sample for the sample was prepared by MEDIÁN Ltd. The names and addresses of the specific persons was selected with a simple random sampling process from the data of the Central Registration and Electorial Bureau.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
C
